Janus Project 2.0.1.0 API

Boot and Configuration 
Package Description
io.janusproject
Classes for configuring and booting the Janus platform.
Janus Micro-Kernel 
Package Description
io.janusproject.kernel
The Janus micro-kernel.
io.janusproject.kernel.annotations
Java annotations for defining the Janus micro-kernel classes.
io.janusproject.kernel.bic
Implementation of the Built-in Capacities provided by the Janus platform.
io.janusproject.kernel.repository
Implementation of repositories.
io.janusproject.kernel.services
This package contains the implementation of the service for the Janus platform.
io.janusproject.kernel.services.arakhne
Implementation of services based on the Arakhne Foundation Classes.
io.janusproject.kernel.services.gson
Implementation of services based on Gson.
io.janusproject.kernel.services.hazelcast
Implementation of services based on Hazelcast.
io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk
Implementation of services based on the standard Java Development Kit.
io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.contextspace
Implementation of the service for managing contexts and spaces based on the Java Development Kit.
io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.executors
Implementation of the execution services based on the Java Development Kit.
io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.network
Implementation of the network services based on the Java Development Kit.
io.janusproject.kernel.services.jdk.spawn
Implementation of the spawn service based on the Java Development Kit.
io.janusproject.kernel.services.zeromq
Implementation of services based on ZeroMQ.
io.janusproject.kernel.space
Classes and tools for implementing spaces in the Janus platform.
Context Space Service 
Package Description
io.janusproject.services.contextspace
Definition of the service for managing contexts and spaces.
Distributed Data Service 
Package Description
io.janusproject.services.distributeddata
Definition of the service for creating data structures over a computer network.
Executor Service 
Package Description
io.janusproject.services.executor
Definition of the service for executing tasks asynchronously.
Infrastructure Service 
Package Description
io.janusproject.services.infrastructure
Definition of the service for managing the low-level/hardware infrastructure.
Kernel Discovery Service 
Package Description
io.janusproject.services.kerneldiscovery
Definition of the service for discovering remote Janus kernels.
Logging Service 
Package Description
io.janusproject.services.logging
Definition of the service for logging messages.
Network Service 
Package Description
io.janusproject.services.network  
Spawn Service 
Package Description
io.janusproject.services.spawn
Definition of the service for spawning agents in a Janus kernel.
Injection Modules 
Package Description
io.janusproject.modules
Injection modules for the Janus platform.
io.janusproject.modules.eventserial
Injection modules for SARL event serialization and encryption.
io.janusproject.modules.executors
Injection modules for the JRE executors.
io.janusproject.modules.hazelcast
Injection modules for the Hazelcast library.
io.janusproject.modules.kernel
Injection modules for the Janus micro-kernel.
io.janusproject.modules.nonetwork
Injection modules for the "no-network" service.
io.janusproject.modules.zeromq
Injection modules for the ZeroMQ network service.
Other Packages 
Package Description
io.janusproject.services
Interfaces and abstract implementations that are the base of the service management of the Janus platform.
io.janusproject.util
General utilities that are included into the Janus platform distribution.
